name: Cornerstone
description:
In this life, you've built foundations for
me, Pillars and stones for love and
hope to prevail, When everything else
turned to dust, You carried the weight
of a thousand worlds, Both mine and
yours, Opened your arms, Kept our
twin flames alive, consuming each
other, And burned your hands, Left
me here at the cornerstone,
Beginning to think I imagined you all
along.
